https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qkTzf83QrF4hxFuI9GfMYoHXouq.jpg Kelly Lofton is a young, successful dentist who has all the material things a woman could ask for. However, Kelly has struggled to find time for love in her busy schedule, so when her younger sister Susan gets engaged to a seemingly perfect man and organizes an extravagant engagement party, Kelly panics. Act Like You Love Me
